case_title: Tauheed Jan vs Umar Bakhtiar, Advocate, Peshawar

legal_points.jurisdiction: Section 41 of the Legal Practitioner and Bar Council Act, 1973

summary.complaint: Allegations of misconduct including threats, abusive language, and firearm intimidation.
summary.disciplinary_committee_decision: Complaint dismissed on 19-10-2002 due to jurisdictional objections.
summary.appeal_decision: Impugned order set aside; case remanded for decision on merits with opportunity for evidence and hearing.
